header.title: Reliable video CDN that truly hops
header.content: Supercharge your video playback and high-quality VOD streaming through our global 150 Tbps+ network. Deliver the best video experience with no buffering and the lowest latency.
header.hint: No credit card needed. Start in seconds.

superCharge.title: Fast network meets unbeatable pricing
superCharge.subTitle: With 123 PoPs worldwide and an 150 Tbps+ network backbone, Gowaf guarantees smooth video playback no matter where your users are.

tabs.title: No more buffering. Ever again.
tabs.content: Enjoy smooth playback thanks to one of the fastest global networks backed by NVMe-based hardware and a smart routing engine. Deliver the best video experience by bringing the content just a hop away from your visitors.

tabs.title: Save up to 80% on your content delivery billing
tabs.content: Don’t overpay for your Content Delivery ever again. At Gowaf, you’ll always only pay for the bandwidth you use and nothing else. We focus on optimizing our costs and passing the savings down to you!

tabs.title: Transform once. Cache and accelerate forever.
tabs.content: Permanently store videos on the CDN with Perma-Cache to reduce origin egress fees and keep your infrastructure hopping faster. Increase performance and reliability by automatically distributing content worldwide for lightning-fast access times.

tabs.title: Enterprise video protection. At no extra charge.
tabs.content: Enjoy enterprise-grade DRM security without the massive costs or technical hurdles. Protect your video content from piracy, stop downloads, screenshots, and prevent hotlinking with a single click of a button with Media Cage.

ad1.title: Deliver video without buffering!
ad1.subTitle: Get started in seconds. No Credit Card Required. Cancel anytime.

list2.title2: Take advantage of powerful features specifically tailored to video delivery. Secure your streams using hotlinking protection and token authentication.

map.title: Bring video delivery to the next level
map.subTitle: The Gowaf network was explicitly designed for efficient video delivery. With strategically selected PoPs around the world, we assure a great price/performance ratio and an incredibly high cache hit rate.

features.title: Replicated Cloud Storage
features.content: Replicate your media library around the world with our Geo-Replicated cloud storage for never before seen performance.

features.title: Redundant Infrastructure
features.content: Without a single point of failure, Gowaf provides enterprise-level reliability, making sure you always stay online.

features.title: NVMe + SSD Powered Servers
features.content: Our servers are powered by NVMe and SSD technology to ensure millisecond latencies when delivering your media files.

supportPlan.title: Simple, clean and customizable player
supportPlan.subTitle: Take advantage of fully customizable bunny.net media player.

main.title: Make it your own
main.subTitle: Maximize branding power by customizing every aspect of your player down to the CDN hostname.

list.title: Choose your Color
list.content: Customize the video player color scheme to match the design of your website perfectly.

list.title: Customize your Controls
list.content: Add or remove player controls to make it a perfect fit for your users’ experience.

features2.title: No more downtime. Ever.
features2.subTitle: Stop DDoS attacks in their tracks before they even start causing damage.

items.title: Always-On CDN Protection
items.content: With automatic, always-on protection, you can put attacks out in less than 10 seconds before they even get fully started.

items.title: Dynamic AI Request Filter
items.content: Stop even the most sophisticated attacks with an AI-powered smart request filter that automatically adapts to your traffic.

items.title: False Positives Avoidance
items.content: Minimize false positive detections and stop infuriating your users with a smart false positive avoidance system.

goFaster.title: Security everywhere you need it
goFaster.subTitle: Protect against all types of threats with a single platform.

tabs.title: Protect against Layer 7 HTTP flood attacks
tabs.content: Stop malicious bots or DDoS scripts from overloading your server. Gowaf helps you stay safe by automatically detecting and blocking malicious HTTP requests using a continuously learning AI security system. We stop threats seconds before they ever reach your origin.

tabs.title: Block volumetric network attacks on the edge
tabs.content: Ensure uninterrupted content delivery with a massive 150 Tbps+ global network that automatically blocks even the largest volumetric attacks right on the edge before hitting your server. Gowaf helps you keep your server safe and your users engaged. No matter what.

tabs.title: Protect your applications with Gowaf WAF
tabs.content: Block malicious requests targeting your applications on the software layer. Gowaf WAF helps you stay safe by blocking common security vulnerabilities and a real-time critical response rule-set maintained by the Gowaf Security team to stay on top of new threats.

tabs.title: Set request and throughput limits with just a few clicks
tabs.content: Protect your online presence and stop bandwidth consumption attacks with simple configurable requests and network limits. You can easily limit the number of connections per IP, requests per second, download speed limits, and the total monthly traffic to stay in full control of your budget.

ad1.title: Stay protected at all time!
ad1.subTitle: Get started in seconds. No Credit Card Required. Cancel anytime.

list1.title2: Use powerful control features to keep full control of the access to your content.

items.title: Token Authentication
items.content: Sign requests to control who, where, and for how long they can access your content.

items.title: Hotlinking Protection
items.content: Stop third-party websites from stealing your content and wasting your bandwidth.

items.title: IP & Geo Blocking
items.content: Restrict content to specific countries or IPs only for full regional control.

chart1.title: A network edge that has your back
chart1.subTitle: 150 Tbps+ network backbone that withstands any DDoS attack.
